QuestData.Title: Parts Unknown
QuestData.Description: Brambley... I still canna' believe it.$b$bI canna' leave the lad here... not in this place... not like this.$b$bHelp me find the rest of him, so I can take his remains back home where he belongs.$b$bWe'll give him a proper burial... it's what he deserves!
QuestData.CompletionText: Aye, is that all of him? We aren't missing any parts are we?
QuestData.RewardText: <Angus wipes away a tear as he speaks.>$b$bBrambley, lad... I promise ye'll have tha' best burial money can buy! An' all the ale ye can drink...
